1189970.name: Runoveryou
1189970.description:
Runoveryou is a Runover simulator, in a way.
It's a runover game where you play as a driver who got tired of those who doesn't belong on the road, so he decides to take matters into his own hands, or more accurately, his wheels.
Drive your vehicle and run over who ever is in the way, play different game modes, customize the game in the "Mods Garage".

You can also create mods If you have the right technical skills, using Unity3D to build your own characters, vehicle, road, obstacles and sky.
It can be done pretty easily using asset-bundles,
please read the Manual: for more details on how to do that.
Mods are stored at indieDB:

Key Features:

  • Game Customization
  • Different game modes
  • Pure fun :)
